name: alphabetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has the same order as the letters of the alphabet: I've arranged the pictures of the animals alphabetically from aardvark to zebra. The names of the contest winners are listed alphabetically. See
alphabetical
More examplesFewer examplesAll the records and CDs in the collection are arranged alphabetically by the name of the musician.We sort the books by subject, not alphabetically.The database can be alphabetically sorted by the program.
